item.title: Old Masters: Richard Avedon
item.author: contact@robertfpickering.me (Robert Pickering)
item.description: While flicking though “La Photographie du 20e Si√®cle” I came across this lovely portrait of the actor Charles Chaplin on his last day in America.

item.title: Old Masters: Irving Penn
item.author: contact@robertfpickering.me (Robert Pickering)
item.description: An attempt to copy Irving Penn’s famous portrait of Pablo Picasso.

item.title: Old Masters - Joel Meyeowitz
item.author: contact@robertfpickering.me (Robert Pickering)
item.description: Continuing from yesterdays idea of recreating photographs from photographers that I admire.

item.title: Old Masters: Renger-Patzsch
item.author: contact@robertfpickering.me (Robert Pickering)
item.description: I decided to try and create my interpretation of some of the photographers that I admire. Here’s some reinterpretation of Albert Renger Patzsch.
